properties.description:
This workflow is trigger from a "notification" action from a "Content Filter" in Cisco Secure Email. 
From the Email in attachement to the notification:
- Email Headers are parsed
- URL in Body are parsed
- Disposition for URL are check
Actions and Responses:
- If URL dispositon is Suspicious, URL is send to TG
- Judgement are created for observables
- Sightins are created
- Casebook is created
 
If you do not have a valid Threat Grid API key make sure to disable the "TG v2 - Submit URL" atomic action.

actions.name: Threat Response v2 - Generate Access Token
actions.title: Threat Response v2 - Generate Access Token

properties.display_name: Threat Response v2 - Generate Access Token

properties.script:
import sys
from datetime import datetime
import time

linux_time = int(time.time()) 

t =  int(linux_time)
timeISO = (datetime.fromtimestamp(t).isoformat())+'+00:00'

delta = 86400 * 30
linux_time = int(time.time()) + delta

t =  int(linux_time)
end_time = (datetime.fromtimestamp(t).isoformat())+'.000Z'
